message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value, I believe it's worth more than $10000. Considering its worth to you is $12000, I propose we start negotiations at $11000. Let me know if this is within your budget or if you'd like to discuss further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me is $12000, I would like to propose a price of $10500. This is my best offer.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline. Our product's value to us is significantly higher than what you've offered. I would like to propose a price of $11500 for the product. This reflects the value we place on it and remains within the range we believe is fair given its worth to you. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $11000 for the product. This is my final offer, as it closely aligns with the value I see in the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. In light of our previous discussions, I am willing to consider a price of $11200 for the product. This is a fair compromise that respects both the value you see in the product and our valuation of it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the product's value to me and our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a price of $11100 for the product. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to consider $11050 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise between our respective valuations and I hope it will be agreeable to you.
